title: University with the most teams registered!
body:
Hey everyone,

Registrations closed a while ago and now we have the final numbers in! The first University to receive viewing party support on the 30th of August is the University of Auckland!

We will be getting in touch with the [UoA LoL club](https://www.facebook.com/groups/UoALoL/) to run a viewing party with Razer support! Congratulations

Remember one other University can win as well through a fan vote so get voting here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/QGuKbE95-ouc-viewing-party-competition

replies.body:
Thats gold for Auckland Uni. 
Well done. ( Where did Uni of Canterbury come in this I wonder)
